name: A matter of TIME (puajklejos)
description:
A matter of TIME is an exciting game that will keep you in tension since every 5 seconds everything changes! 

Adapt yourself, improve and get the best score! 

Compete against  your friends to know who is the one that best suits time!

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Movement

Esc - Pause Menu

Thanks for playing! We would appreciate any feedback!
